spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is well-preserved. There are some minor inconsistencies in wall thickness and a few window discrepancies. Balcony dimensions do not match plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Plan and room labels are present on the 3D render, leading to significant deductions for UI/Annotation Cleanliness and Presentation Context. The model appears to be on a ground plane with shadows extending.

furniture_mapping.notes: Most major furniture items are present. Some smaller items are missing from the Living & Dining area. The balcony furniture is simplified and potentially misplaced.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The geometry style, lighting, and camera composition adhere well to the specified requirements. The rendering is clean, low-poly, and uses flat colors.

detected_errors.description: Text labels present on the 3D render ('KITCHEN', 'LIVING & DINING', 'TOILET', 'UTILITY', 'BEDROOM-1', 'BALCONY', dimensions).
Measurement lines/dimensions are present on the 3D render.
One window missing from BATH-1 in the 3D render.
Balcony dimensions in 3D render ('7'10" x 2'8"') do not match 2D plan ('7'10" x 3'5"').

Ground plane is visible with shadows extending beyond the model, and background is not purely dark neutral. This conflicts with 'Model appears floating/isolated' and 'No ground plane/shadows extending to infinity'.

Missing small side table/storage from Living & Dining area. Missing plant from Living & Dining area. Missing desk/chair from Bedroom. Balcony furniture simplified and changed from 2 potted plants to a chair.

summary: The 3D render demonstrates strong spatial accuracy and excellent aesthetic quality but suffers from the critical presence of text labels and measurement annotations from the 2D plan.
